resources.string: Device information, storage space, and camera permissions are required to use the full service
Please click \"Setting\" Set permissions manually to allow
To assess your eligibility and facilitate fast disbursement of your loan application, we need permissions to access your Phone, Location and Contacts.

Collect and monitor specific information about your device including your hardware model, operating system and version, unique device identifier, user profile information, wi-fi information, mobile network information to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that unauthorised devices are not able to act on your behalf helping us to prevent frauds.
Collect contacts information to detect references and to auto fill data during loan application process.
Collect information about the location of your device to provide serviceability of your loan application, reduce risks associated with your application and also provide customised offers.

Allow camera to capture images of documents and pictures of yourself for loan application. Allow storage to upload documents and pictures for loan application. Allow the application to collect a list of installed apps in your device for credit profile enrichment.
By continuing you agree to our Privacy Policy & Terms of Services and receive communication from APP via SMS, E-Mail and WhatsApp.
Please check and enter a correct mobile phone number!
Please enter the SMS verification code!
Please enter the correct cell phone number!
